DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE
DOC.TEXT: Humanitarian Award : John Padgett , a family-practice physician assistant for Bristol Park Medical Group in San Clemente , has been selected national Humanitarian of the Year by the American Academy of Physician Assistants / National Professional Group . Padgett has sent medical teams to El_Salvador , the Honduras / Nicaragua border , Southeast_Asia , Afghanistan and other needy areas through his association with Refugee Relief International Inc. , a nonprofit charitable organization . As a veteran of the Vietnam_War and a former Special Forces medic in Southeast_Asia , Padgett said he recognized the importance of quality health_care . " What touched me most deeply was the suffering of the innocent , " Padgett said . " It became my intention to do something to help them if I had the opportunity. " With the award , Padgett received $ 1 # 000 and a matching contribution to the charity of his choice , Refugee Relief International .
